title: Flying Lessons
description: Owly is a kind-hearted little owl who knows what it means to be human.The third graphic novel in the breakout, all-ages series is a charming story of understanding and acceptance, where Owly learns that everyone is special and it's okay to be different.Relying on a mixture of symbols and expressions, Andy Runton's animated and heartwarming style makes Owly a perfect read for everyone.
author: Andy Runton
